title: Is there any lore behind the statues in the BBA building?
content:
A series of jokes led to renaming a whatsapp gc to 7 statues. I just wanna know if the statues of BBA building are in some way related to any suicides.
(My ISAs start tomorrow and I'm starting math now ğŸ™ğŸ™)

comments.body: Kids doing everything but studying for their ISA. After ISA y'all will be the ones making countless posts on how difficult the ISA was and why PES screwed you all over
did you find out? (Physics is tomorrow and I'm starting now ğŸ™ğŸ™)

![gif](giphy|Isy3Gz7OEqf55JhBjl|downsized)

One more post and this man shall push from the BBA block. Thika muchkondu hodhu bvc.

Too much going on in my life rn.... (it's not good)
Need a distraction ğŸ˜­
